item.title: what got me into coding
item.description: thead { -- table{ color: black; } R packages library(knitr) library(DT) library(plotly) library(widgetframe) library(tidyverse) library(tidyquant) Fetch Stock Index stock_index <- tq_index("DOW") stock_index %>% select(symbol,sector,company,weight) %>% mutate(weight = round(weight*100,2)) %>% datatable(options = list(dom = 'tp'),rownames=F) {"x":{"filter":"none","data":[["BA","AAPL","HD","UNH","MCD","GS","V","MMM","IBM","TRV","MSFT","UTX","JNJ","DIS","CAT","PG","WMT","AXP","CVX","JPM","NKE","MRK","XOM","VZ","WBA","KO","INTC","DOW","CSCO","PFE"],["Industrials","Information Technology","Consumer Discretionary","Health Care","Consumer Discretionary","Financials","Information Technology","Industrials","Information Technology","Financials","Information Technology","Industrials","Health Care","Communication Services","Industrials","Consumer Staples","Consumer Staples","Financials","Energy","Financials","Consumer Discretionary","Health Care","Energy","Communication Services","Consumer Staples","Consumer Staples","Information Technology","Materials","Information Technology","Health Care"],["Boeing Company","Apple Inc.","Home Depot Inc.
